name: Jezus Inaczej
description:
Different kind of Jesus

Game made during our first gamejam MFKIG 2015.

Our hero superpower is ability of turning wine into water. Controls left and right arrow keys to move, space - use your superpower. Objective: turn all wines bottles into water by using your superpower when overlapping with other characters. Made with libGDX and Box2D. You need Java to run it.
